UniprotID	Q86SU0-5
Accession	Q86SU0;Q6ZP61;Q7Z578
EntryName	ILDR1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Immunoglobulin-like domain-containing receptor 1 (Angulin-2)
GeneName	ILDR1
Length	457
Function	Maintains epithelial barrier function by recruiting MARVELD2/tricellulin to tricellular tight junctions (tTJs) (PubMed:23239027). Crucial for normal hearing by maintaining the structural and functional integrity of tTJs, which are critical for the survival of auditory neurosensory HCs. Mediates fatty acids and lipoproteins-stimulated CCK/cholecystokinin secretion in the small intestine. In the inner ear, may regulate alternative pre-mRNA splicing via binding to TRA2A, TRA2B and SRSF1 (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cell junction; Tight junction; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytosol
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar	
Charge	
pNuLoCProb	0.15480803
pNuLoCRegion
